data.text:
Although Bethany Joy Lenz or Joie Lenz is a famous American actress and director, she is also popular as a singer and songwriter.

Lenz as an actress is best known for her role as Lucas Scott’s (Haley James Scott) best friend in the TV drama “One Tree Hill” – created by Mark Schwahn. She has received a lot of attention as a member of the Everly group, as well as as a solo artist.

Joy formed Everly with her friend Amber Sweeneyen in 2008. Their debut album, “Mission Bell,” was released on iTunes. Although Bethany and Amber decided to drop Everly in 2012 for reasons best known to them, the former is an accomplished vocalist with a four-octave range.

Before Joy Lenz portrayed Haley in ‘One TreeHill’, she was spotlighted as Reva Shayne on the TV soap – ‘Guiding Light’. Guinness World Records listed the soap opera as one of the longest-running television dramas in American history.

Bethany Joy Lenza’s portrayal of Reva Shayne caught the attention of many viewers and critics. Due to the public attention she garnered during her three-week role as Reva Shayne and the favorable reviews she garnered, the producers of the CBS Daytime soap opera decided to do something that didn’t never been done in the industry. They rehired Lenz for another role on the same soap opera. This time Lenz portrayed a major character – Michelle Bauer Santos.

Bethany Joy Lenz Bio, Age

The actress will celebrate her 37th birthday on April 2, 2018. She was born in 1981 in Hollywood, Florida.

Lenz is the only child of her parents, RobertGeorge Lenz and Catharine Malcolm Holt Shepard. While his father, Robert worked as a history teacher and therapist, his mother was a people manager and an entrepreneur.

Outside of her career, Bethany Joy Lenz is fascinated by photography and writing, just as she is passionate about knitting, stationery making and painting.

Partnering with Stilnes, Lenz began creating her own jewelry in 2016. It’s inspired by a journey the comedian took when she was 16. She traveled to the Fort Apache Indian Reservation and her travel experience never left her. If you ask Lenz about it, she’ll say something similar to this:

“…When I started designing this jewelry collection capsule, I had just started painting again and the theme that kept coming back to my brush tip was Buffalo.

“In many Indian communities, the Buffalo has long been a symbol of self-sacrifice; he gives until there is nothing left. In honor of the Native American community, I’m thrilled to partner with Stilnest and bring you the Buffalo Offering collection. ”

Lenz is a philanthropist. She actively supports Love146, an international non-profit human rights organization. Sometime in 2011, she launched an online store and pledged all of her proceeds to charity.

Bethany Joy Lenz Married, Husband

It was in November 2005 that Joy Lenz announced her engagement to former Enation band member Michael Galeotti.

Lenz finally married Galeotti on December 31, 2005.

Everyone thought everything was fine for Lenz and Galeotti until she revealed in March 2012 that they had broken down and agreed to end the marriage.

“…As much as I enjoy sharing with you the magic of ordinary days, I am also very private in my personal life. In fact, the only reason I say anything about it is that you’ll soon be wondering why everyone is calling me “Bethany Joy Lenz” again…I’m sorry to say that Michael and I have decided to divorce., she announced on her blog.
